price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Me mmisa mo (nsεmpa a mereka kyerε mo no) ho akatua, na menka wͻn a wͻpatu de adesoa a enni hͻ soa no ho.
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٖ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَكَلِّفِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul mā asalukum ʿalayhi min ajrin wamā anā mina al-mutakalifīna
